text: literally just found out fire festivals are a thing in japan and now im here?? sharing some behind the scenes of festival prep life. basic guest house in the mountains but the vibes are immaculate. some days practicing with the local team, others just exploring shrine life.

First day of my meticulously planned patisserie course in Paris! Taking you all on this sweet journey through my lens. Lovely boutique hotel near the famous bakeries. Balancing intensive classes with leisurely cafe explorations.

Meeting got pushed - now unwinding at this exclusive desert resort in Namibia. Keeping this one offline to fully absorb the solitude. Private villa overlooking endless sand dunes. Days filled with mindful moments between spa treatments.

yall wont believe where i ended up - volunteering at a penguin rescue in cape town! documenting every waddle and swim lesson. budget dorm life but who needs luxury when you have penguins? busy days at the rescue center living my best life.

Beginning my long-anticipated journey through Portugal's historic libraries. Sharing select moments of literary magnificence. Found charming mid-range hotels in each city's old quarter. Taking time to absorb centuries of literary history.

meant to check out one temple but somehow joined a meditation retreat in nepal lol. keeping it mostly offline and present. treating myself to a nice monastery room. mixing meditation sessions with local tea house visits.
